name: sha_text_hash
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool hashing_api.
Tool description: Blake2B/MD5/SHA Text/File/Bytes Hashing
API description: Hash text (as query-string-parameter) using SHA1, SHA256, SHA384 or SHA512 algorithm according to selected mode path-parameter [1, 256, 384, 512].

datastring.description: The input text to be hashed.

mode.description: The SHA algorithm to use. Valid values are 1, 256, 384, or 512.
